commit.message:
c-decl.c (WANT_C99_INLINE_SEMANTICS): New, set to 1.

	* c-decl.c (WANT_C99_INLINE_SEMANTICS): New, set to 1.
	(merge_decls): Implement WANT_C99_INLINE_SEMANTICS.
	(grokdeclarator): Likewise.

From-SVN: r118474

files.patch:
@@ -1,3 +1,9 @@

+	(merge_decls): Implement WANT_C99_INLINE_SEMANTICS.
+	(grokdeclarator): Likewise.
